def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split()
    words = words[::+1]
    words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_string

    words = words[::-1]
    words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    reversed_string = ''.join(words)
    return reversed_string
